title: 1985년 Powell 사건
summary: 미국 New York, NY 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Powell. 판결일: 1985-12-30. 법원: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: The People of the State of New York v. Riis Powell
**판결일**: 1985-12-30
**법원**: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York
**관할**: New York, NY

## 인용

- 115 A.D.2d 783

## 판결문 요약


Appeal by defendant from a judgment of the Supreme Court, Kings County (Owens, J.), rendered November 10, 1983, convicting him of robbery in the second degree, upon his plea of guilty, and imposing sentence.
Judgment affirmed.
We have reviewed the record and agree with defendant’s assigned counsel that there are no meritorious issues which could be raised on appeal. Counsel’s application for leave to withdraw as counsel is granted (see, Anders v California, 386 US 738; People v Paige, 54 AD2d 631; cf. People v Gonzalez, 47 NY2d 606). Lazer, J. P., Thompson, O’Connor, Rubin and Kunzeman, JJ., concur.
...
